1135:3: yathā kathitaṃ cāryaratnameghe-sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasattvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalāpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati |
1135:4: sa samārjanopalepanaṃ kurvan sarvasattvānāmaprāsādikeryāpathavigamāya prāsādikeryāpathasaṃpade ca pariṇāmayati |
1135:6: sa vihāraṃ praviśannevaṃ cittamutpādayati-sarvasattvān nirvāṇapuraṃ praveśayeyam |
1135:8: sa labhanadvāramuddhāṭayannevaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvānāṃ lokottareṇa jñānena nirvāṇasugatidvāramuddhāṭayeyam |
1135:9: sa pidadhadevaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvānāṃ sarvāpāyadvārāṇi pidadhyām |
1135:10: sa niṣīdannevaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvān bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayeyam |
1135:11: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvana śayyāṃ kalpayanevaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvāneva parinirvāpayeyam |
1135:12: sa tato vyuttiṣṭhannevaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvān vyutthāpayeyaṃ sarvakleśaparyutthānebhyaḥ |
1135:13: sa śarīragatyā gacchannevaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvā mahāpuruṣagatyā gacchantu |
1135:14: sa tatropaviṣṭa evaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvā niḥśalyakriyā yaduta rāgadveṣamohebhyaḥ |
1135:15: sa śaucaṃ kurvannevaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvānāṃ kleśamalān prakṣālayeyam |
1135:16: sa hastau prakṣālayannevaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvānāṃ sarvakleśavāsanāmapanayeyam |
1135:17: sa pādau prakṣālayannevaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvānāmanekaprakārāṇi kleśarajāṃsyapanayeyam |
1135:18: mukhaṃ prakṣālayannevaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvānāṃ sarvadharmamukhāni pariśodhayeyam |
1135:19: sa dantakāṣṭhaṃ bhakṣayannevaṃ cittamutpādayati- sarvasattvānāṃ nānāvidhān kleśamalānapanayeyam |
1135:21: tathāgatacaityaṃ vandamāna evaṃ cittamutpādayati-sarvasattvā vandanīyā bhavantu sadevakasya lokasyeti ||
1135:22: athavā yathā āryaprajñāpāramitāyām- punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyālakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nottrasitavyam,
1135:26: tathā hi tena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya |
1135:31: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastatra buddhakṣetre tiryagyonigatāḥ sattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
1135:33: corakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam |
1135:36: utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisattvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkāropa- karaṇena ca |
1135:37: tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam- te cenme sattvāḥ pariṣkāropakaraṇāni haranti,
1135:40: tatra mayā na dveṣo na krodha utpādayitavyaḥ |
1135:41: teṣāmapi mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasā aparāddhavyam |
1135:42: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati |
1135:46: yathā me'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastatra buddhakṣetre ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
1135:48: pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam |
1135:51: evaṃ cānena cittamutpādayitavyam - sarvasattvānāṃ mayā sarvatṛṣṇācchedāya śikṣitavyam |
1135:54: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāmantike mahākaruṇācittamutpādayiṣyāmi- aho batālpapuṇyā amī sattvā yadeteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante |
1135:57: yathā me'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃvuddhasya satastatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na prajñāsyante |
1135:60: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśo yathā vīryapāramitā tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyati |
1135:61: punaraparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam |
1135:62: evaṃ cānena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ- tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye,
1135:64: yathā me'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti,
1135:66: sukhitā eva te sattvā bhaviṣyanti sukhasamaṅginaḥ sarvasukhasamarpitāḥ |
1135:67: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yo ya evābhiprāyo bhaviṣyati,
1135:70: tadyathāpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasā sarvaṃ prādurbhavati,
1135:72: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti,
1135:73: avaikalpaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ sarvadeti ||
1135:104: āryaprajñāpāramitāyāṃ tvāha- sacetvamānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānā śrāvakabhūmau dharma deśayeḥ,
1135:105: tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhastramahāsāhastre lokadhātau sattvāste sarve'rhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ |
1135:106: tadadyāpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt |
1135:107: sacetpunaḥ tvamānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaikamapi prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ,
1135:110: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhastramahāsāhastre lokadhātau sattvāste sarve'rhatvaṃ prāpnuyuḥ |
1135:111: teṣāṃ cārhatāṃ yaddānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu,
1135:112: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda api nu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ?
1135:115: bhagavānāha- ataḥ sa ānanda śrāvakayānikapudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati,
1135:116: yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharma deśayati |
1135:118: yo bodhisattvo mahāsatvo'parasya bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
1135:126: idamānanda tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānāmapi sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlamabhibhavati |
1135:129: asthānamānanda anavakāśo yatsa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivarteta anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
1135:174: atraivāha- na ca kasyacidantaśo dharmapremṇā'pyadhikataramanugrahaṃ karoti ||
1135:178: evaṃ tvaṃ vāca bhāṣeyā yuṣme( āyuṣmān)
1135:180: kathaṃ mahātmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā |
1135:181: sahasaiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā tu bhājanam |
1135:183: yadi duḥśīlān paśyesi pariṣāyāṃ bahūn sthitān |
1135:184: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣestvaṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ ||
1135:186: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ sāṃlekhikīṃ kathām ||
1135:188: labdhapakṣastadā bhūtvā varṇa śīlasya kīrtayeḥ || iti ||
1135:213: imāni sāgaramate mantrapadāni dharmabhāṇakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā,
1135:215: dharmāsananiṣaṇṇena sarvāṃ parṣadaṃ bodhyākārābhinirhṛtayā maitryā spharitvā ātmani vaidyasaṃjñāmutpādya dharme bhaiṣajyasaṃjñāṃ dharmaśravaṇikeṣvāturasaṃjñāṃ tathāgate satpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ dharmanetryāṃ cirasthitikasaṃjñāmutpādya imāni mantrapadānyāmukhīkṛtya dharmasaṃkathā karaṇīyā |
1135:216: tasya samantādyojanaśate na māro na mārakāyikā vā devatā upasaṃkramayiṣyanti vicakṣuḥkaraṇe |
1135:219: atraivāha- dharmabhāṇakena caukṣeṇa śucisamudācāreṇa susnātena śucinivāsitena bhavitavyamiti ||
1135:224: evameva mañjuśrīrnānāsaṃbhāropacitaṃ bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlaṃ bodhicittasaṃgṛhītaṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitaṃ vivardhate | iti ||
1135:230: tatra anutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāyaiva chandaṃ janayati,
1135:235: utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatītyanena śuddhiḥ |
1135:237: yāvadutpannānāṃ ca sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya chandaṃ janayatītyādi anena vṛddhiḥ |
1135:247: tadyathā tīvrakopaprasādasya rājño bhaiṣajyatailaparipūrṇabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā picchilasaṃkrameṇa bhṛtyasya gacchataḥ ||
1135:250: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati,
1135:252: evaṃ yāvanmanasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati,
1135:254: sarvadharmeṣvāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥśaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
1135:264: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaśca vīryaṃ ca ,
1135:266: yena smṛtisaṃprajanyena sarvān bodhipakṣān dharmānna vipraṇāśayati |
1135:267: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaśca vīryaṃ ca smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ ca,
1135:269: yoniśaḥprayukto hi guhyakādhipate bodhisattvo yadasti tadastīti prajānāti,
1135:281: ātmatvaṃ na svataḥ siddhaṃ kimapekṣya paro bhavet ||
1135:282: tadduḥkhena na me bādhetyato yadi na rakṣasi |
1135:290: tannāśāccāgato vṛddhaḥ ekaḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ mataḥ |
1135:296: anirdeśyaḥ svataḥ prāptaḥ kāya ityucyate na saḥ ||
1135:297: tatra cintaiva me nāsti dṛśyakāyastu nāśavān |
1135:301: na ca trīṇi pradhānāni tathā sattā guṇā api |
1135:308: svasaṃtāne ca dṛṣṭo'sau nityeṣu ca kathaṃ yathā |
1135:310: dīpatailaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti kṣīyamāṇaṃ na lakṣyate |
1135:311: evaṃ bhāvā na lakṣyante kṣīyamāṇāḥ pratikṣaṇam ||
1135:324: evaṃ parārthaṃ kṛtvāpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ |
1135:340: tṛṣṇā parigraho yasya tasya duḥkhaṃ na śāmyati |
1135:342: loke duḥkhāgnitapte ca kā ratiḥ svasukhe bhavet |
1135:349: pratikṣaṇaṃ hi yātyeva kāyaścittaṃ ca me yataḥ ||
1135:351: bodhiḥ kāyena labhyeta nanu labdhā mayaiva sā ||
1135:355: yuktayā saṃrakṣya tu dravyaṃ sattveṣu vopayojayet ||
1135:356: svakāye parakāye vā yadduḥkhaṃ neha duḥkhakṛt |
1135:363: svārthaghneṣu yadi dveṣaḥ kṛpā kutra bhaviṣyati |
1135:364: nirdayasyāpi kaḥ koṣaḥ parārtho yadi naśyati ||
1135:381: ka eva mama duḥkhena duḥkhī syānme bhayādbhayī |
1135:386: skhalan pade pade śocyaḥ para ātmā ca sarvadā ||
1135:388: na yuktaṃ yujyate tvatra guṇān dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ mahat ||
1135:395: tatra yaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhītiṃ śrāvayedanyato'pi vā |
1135:396: pradviṣṭo vā prasanno vā same prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt ||
